title: New CHP plant will make Moy Park's Craigavon facility twice as energy efficient - The Irish News
summary: Moy Park installed a new CHP unit at its Craigavon facility to improve energy efficiency and move closer to its net zero goal by 2040. The company is taking various measures to reduce greenhouse gas emissions, improve energy efficiency, and invest in sustainable practices.
green_innovation: TRUE - The installation of the new CHP unit at the Craigavon facility represents a green innovation as it contributes to sustainability goals by improving energy efficiency and moving Moy Park closer to its net zero emissions target.
business_innovation: TRUE - Moy Park's installation of the CHP unit at its Craigavon facility can be considered a business innovation as it represents an improved business process aimed at enhancing efficiency and sustainability.
green_product: FALSE - The article does not focus on a specific product but rather on the installation of a CHP unit at a facility, which represents a process innovation rather than a product innovation.
green_process: TRUE - The implementation of the CHP unit at Moy Park's Craigavon facility represents a green process innovation as it aims to minimize environmental impacts, improve energy efficiency, and promote sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 311615 - Poultry Processing, 221210 - Natural Gas Distribution, 541330 - Engineering Services, 237130 - Power and Communication Line and Related Structures Construction
greenwashing: FALSE - The article does not exhibit greenwashing as it focuses on genuine efforts by Moy Park to improve energy efficiency and sustainability at its facilities.

title: AG unveils new £3m factory in Fivemiletown, but confirms closure of Moy site - The Irish News
summary: AG has unveiled a new £3 million factory in Fivemiletown, investing in increased production capacity for paving products to meet growing demand in Ireland and the UK.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 327390 - Other Concrete Product Manufacturing, 324121 - Asphalt Paving Mixture and Block Manufacturing, 321113 - Sawmills, 221122 - Electric Power Distribution
